meaningMnemonic: The <radical>face</radical> radical and the <kanji>face</kanji> kanji are the same! But this isn't just a face like the one you're looking at your computer/phone with. It's the <kanji>surface</kanji> kind of face too!
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>face</kanji> you're looking at, that has a lot of <kanji>surface</kanji> area, belongs to <reading>men</reading> (めん). Not a single man, but all men put together. It's hundreds of thousands of men's faces in a row.
